Address.label: Address
Address.value: 923 E THIRD STREET,SUITE 111, LOS ANGELES, California, 90013, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Oblong, Inc. provides multi-stream collaboration technologies and managed services for video collaboration and network applications. The company operates in two segments, Oblong and Oblong Industries. Its flagship product is Mezzanine that enables visual collaboration across multi-users, multi-screens, multi-devices, and multi-locations for video telepresence, laptop and application sharing, and whiteboard sharing and slides applications. The company also provides managed video conferencing services; and remote service management, as well as support and management services for customer video environments. It serves customers in the enterprise, commercial, and public sector markets. The company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
